column5: I phoned Cabelas last Thursday night and ordered a GPS unit, and was told delivery would take between 3 - 7 business days to arrive here in Toronto.  I received it today.........3 business days.  No wonder some companies flourish !!
I have never bought anything from them but I keep hearing good things about their service. This is just another confirmation. Glad they (and you) did good.
3 days eh Lew - Hmmm - slowing down   LOL  Always top notch service in my books  Don

I'm not surprised. For the last 10 years or so I've probably averaged 5-6 orders a year with them, and never once have they let me down. Shipping is always fast, prices are good, selection is the best, and return policy is second to none.
and the price the quote you is the price you pay..it is a great place to buy from
just got my new rod from Cabelas in the mail yesterday, quick shipping, very happy customer! .. Bud
Curious! What is the average duty from them to ship into Canada?  Easton
i order from them quite often   all i have to say is number 1 service, and its weird sometimes i get charged duty and other times i dont get charged ...weird..
Yea Lew, Dad, Ben and I like Cabelas.... Just not the bill
Cabelas has a good reputation when it comes to getting your purchased items on time, I recently ordered a few things and got them in 4 business days.
Place an order online last Weds for some baits for an upcoming trip   and they were sitting on my dinning room table when I got home from work Friday. I was impressed!  Whopper

i've always had Grrreat svc from Cabela's shipping on my Trolling Motor Killed me ... shoul've bought it @ CTC... but on average   very very good svc..good prices great selection it's 'boot time they build one up here ..
If the products are manufactured in the US there is no duty, if they are made in China or any other country they will hit you for the duty fee.
Made in North America, no duty is paid, made elsewhere, you do.
I've been ordering from Cabelas since the 70's. I've never had a bad experience yet. Even if something goes wrong, they fix it and fast.
Yea, Cabelas rocks for sure I've got tons of stuff from them, never a problem yet.
how can you find out where it was made?
Cabelas customer service could probably help you out with that  1-800-237-4444
The business I work for became an international dealer for Cabelas last year.  I have looked after the ordering for our customers and the sales have been great and the service from Cabelas is super.
Yup I would have been much happier if we got Cabelas instead of BPS. Cabelas is much better store.  Always great service and lots of stock

well I like both stores the only problem with BPS online ordering is they ship UPS and UPS screws you with broker fees everytime I am sure BPS has lost millions in Canada cataloge sales after going with UPS, pity
We normally order pizza for take-out...
